questionnaire_description: Taking into account the description and aim of the exercise and observing the repetition, answer the questions by assigning the number associated with the answer

exercise_stages.stage_1: The subject holds the bar with the elbow completely extended and with arms aligned to the shoulders, at 90â—¦ with respect to the trunk.
exercise_stages.stage_2: The subject has to flex the knees up to 60 degress /70 degress and then return to the starting position.

body segment terminology.hands distance: distance between the tips of the hands
body segment terminology.hand-shoulder distance: distance between the hand and the shoulder of the same side
body segment terminology.torso area: the frontal area enclosed by the shoulders and the hips
body segment terminology.transverse shoulder shift: The translation of the shoulder in the transverse plane (left, right, up, down)
body segment terminology.sagittal knee angles: angle between the thigh and the calf for each leg in the sagittal plane

PO_questions.x: Is the sagittal knee angles maximized for the right leg?
PO_questions.y: Is the sagittal knee angles maximized for the left leg?
PO_questions.1: Are the metrics in the above 2 questions achieved in the exercise?
PO_questions.2: Is the exercise carried out in a constant manner throughout? Is rise time equal to fall time?
PO_questions.3: Is the amplitude of the movement complete in the exercise? Is the amplitude maximized at the middle frame?

CF_questions._comment: # Default answer for questions a to h should be 3. DO NOT include this field in the result.
CF_questions.a: Is the hands distance constant in all 5 frames?
CF_questions.b: Is the ankle distance constant in all 5 frames?
CF_questions.c: Is the shoulder distance constant in all 5 frames?
CF_questions.d: Is the knee distance constant in all 5 frames?
CF_questions.e: Are the hip distance constant in all 5 frames?
CF_questions.f: Is the torso area constant in ALL 5 frames?
CF_questions.g: Are the hand-shoulder distance symmetrical and constant on the left and right in all 5 frames?
CF_questions.h: Is the subject free of ANY forward or backward bending of the trunk?
CF_questions.i: Is the body aligned to the sagittal plane in all 5 frames?
CF_questions.j: Is the subject free of ANY transverse shoulder shift in all 5 frames?
CF_questions.4: Based on your answer for c and j, is the posture of the head correct?
CF_questions.5: Based on your answer for a, c, and g, is the posture of the right arm correct?
CF_questions.6: Based on your answer for a, c, and g, is the posture of the left arm correct?
CF_questions.7: Based on your answer for e, f, h, and i, is the posture of the trunk correct?
CF_questions.8: Based on your answer for e, f, h, and j, is the posture of the pelvis correct?
CF_questions.9: Based on your answer for b, d, and g, is the posture of the right leg correct?
CF_questions.10: Based on your answer for b, d, and g, is the posture of the left leg correct?
